## Agent Decision Matrix

| Scenario | Primary Agent | Supporting Agents | Expected Outcome |
|----------|--------------|-------------------|------------------|
| "What UV wavelength?" | Research ğŸ”¬ | Hardware âš¡, Safety ğŸ›¡ï¸ | Evidence-based recommendation |
| "Design LED circuit" | Hardware âš¡ | Research ğŸ”¬, Software ğŸ’», Safety ğŸ›¡ï¸ | Schematic + BOM + Test protocol |
| "Improve hand tracking" | Software ğŸ’» | Research ğŸ”¬, Integration ğŸ”— | Optimized algorithm + benchmarks |
| "New safety feature" | Safety ğŸ›¡ï¸ | ALL agents | Multi-layer safety validation |
| "3D print design" | Design ğŸ¨ | Hardware âš¡, Safety ğŸ›¡ï¸ | STL files + print settings |
| "System integration" | Integration ğŸ”— | ALL agents | Working end-to-end system |

## Example: Multi-Agent Collaboration

### Scenario: Implementing Pulsed UV Mode


## Agent Communication Patterns

### Pattern 1: Question & Answer
```
Developer â†’ Research Agent: "What UV wavelength?"
Research Agent â†’ Analysis + Evidence
Research Agent â†’ Hardware Agent: "Can we source 365nm LEDs?"
Hardware Agent â†’ Component availability + pricing
All Agents â†’ Consensus: "Use 365nm, implement by [date]"
```

### Pattern 2: Design Review
```
Hardware Agent â†’ Circuit design posted
Software Agent â†’ "GPIO compatibility confirmed"
Safety Agent â†’ "Add redundant interlock"
Research Agent â†’ "Thermal calculations correct"
Hardware Agent â†’ Updates design based on feedback
Safety Agent â†’ "Approved for testing"
```

### Pattern 3: Problem Escalation
```
Software Agent â†’ "Performance issue: 18 FPS"
Integration Agent â†’ Profiles system bottleneck
Research Agent â†’ "MediaPipe lite mode recommended"
Software Agent â†’ Implements optimization
Hardware Agent â†’ "Verified on Pi 4: Now 32 FPS"
Integration Agent â†’ "Issue resolved"
```

## Monitoring Agent Activity

### GitHub Insights

```bash
# View agent issues
gh issue list --label "agent:research"
gh issue list --label "agent:hardware"
gh issue list --label "agent:software"

# View agent activity
gh issue list --search "commenter:github-actions[bot]"

# View workflow runs
gh run list --workflow=agent-system.yml
```

## Future Vision

### Phase 1 (Current): Automated Triggering
- âœ… Issue templates trigger agents
- âœ… Agents comment with structured analysis
- âœ… Workflows automate checks
- ğŸ”„ Manual agent review and decisions

### Phase 2 (Next): AI-Powered Agents
- ğŸ¯ GPT-4/Claude integration for intelligent responses
- ğŸ¯ Agents generate code/designs autonomously
- ğŸ¯ Natural language agent interactions
- ğŸ¯ Continuous learning from outcomes

### Phase 3 (Future): Autonomous Development
- ğŸš€ Agents create PRs independently
- ğŸš€ Multi-agent debates and voting
- ğŸš€ Self-improving codebase
- ğŸš€ Human oversight, agent execution
